The recession cone of a convex set is convex.

lemma recessionCone_convex {n : Nat} {C : Set (EuclideanSpace Real (Fin n))} (hconv : Convex Real C) : Convex Real (Set.recessionCone C) := by intro y hy y hy a b ha hb hab x hx t ht have hx : x + t y C := hy hx ht have hx : x + t y C := hy hx ht have hcomb : a (x + t y) + b (x + t y) = x + t (a y + b y) := by ext i simp [smul_add, smul_smul, add_comm, add_left_comm, add_assoc, mul_comm, mul_assoc] calc a * x.ofLp i + b * x.ofLp i = (a + b) * x.ofLp i := by ring _ = x.ofLp i := by simp [hab] have hmem : a (x + t y) + b (x + t y) C := hconv hx hx ha hb hab exact hcomb.symm hmem
